sen.j: 甘露寺 規長（かんろじ のりなが、正徳 (日本)3年6月23日 (旧暦)（1713年8月13日） - 天明3年12月22日 (旧暦)（1784年1月14日））は、江戸時代の公卿。
sen.e: Norinaga KANROJI (August 13, 1713 - January 14, 1784) was Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.
Norinaga KANROJI (August 13, 1713 - January 14, 1784) was a Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.
Norinaga KANROJI (August 13, 1713 - January 14, 1784) was a Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.

sen.j: 名家 (公家)の家格である甘露寺家当主。
sen.e: He was the family head of the Kanroji family, which was meike (or meika) (the fourth highest status for court nobles).
He was the head of the Kanroji family which was Meika (or Meike) (the fourth highest status for court nobles).
sen.cmt: the family head -> the head, which -> カンマを削除しました。
sen.e: He was the head of the Kanroji family which was Meika (or Meike) (the fourth highest status for court nobles).
His foster father was 尚長 KANROJI.
His foster father was Naonaga KANROJI.
His foster father was Naonaga KANROJI.
His real father was 尚房 MADENOKOJI.
His biological father was Naofusa MADENOKOJI.
His biological father was Naofusa MADENOKOJI.
His real mother was a daughter of Kaneyuki YOSHIDA.
His biological mother was a daughter of Kaneyuki YOSHIDA.
sen.cmt: real -> biological兼敬は「かねゆき」と「かねたか」の読みがありましたが、ここではtrans1のままとしています。かねゆきhttp://kotobank.jp/word/%E5%90%89%E7%94%B0%E5%85%BC%E6%95%ACかねたかhttp://www1.parkcity.ne.jp/sito/k131.html
sen.e: His biological mother was a daughter of Kaneyuki YOSHIDA.

sen.j: 正室は秋月藩主黒田長貞の娘、継室は龍野藩主脇坂安清の娘。
sen.e: His lawful wife was a daughter of Nagasada KURODA, the lord of Akizuki domain, and his second wife was a daughter of Yasuzumi WAKISAKA, the lord of Tatsuno domain.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Nagasada KURODA, the lord of Akizuki Domain, and his second wife was a daughter of Yasuzumi WAKISAKA, the lord of Tatsuno Domain.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Nagasada KURODA, the lord of Akizuki Domain, and his second wife was a daughter of Yasuzumi WAKISAKA, the lord of Tatsuno Domain.

sen.j: 薩摩藩第5代藩主・島津継豊の正室・浄岸院（竹姫）は叔母にあたる。
sen.e: Jogan-in (Takehime), the lawful wife of Tsugutoyo SHIMAZU, the fifth lord of Satsuma domain, was his aunt.
His aunt was Joganin (Takehime), the lawful wife of Tsugutoyo SHIMAZU, the fifth lord of Satsuma Domain.
sen.cmt: Jogan-in -> Joganindomain -> Domain文体を他と合わせました。
sen.e: His aunt was Joganin (Takehime), the lawful wife of Tsugutoyo SHIMAZU, the fifth lord of Satsuma Domain.
He had a son, Kazunaga KANROJI.
His son was Kazunaga KANROJ.
sen.cmt: 文体を他と合わせました。
sen.e: His son was Kazunaga KANROJ.

sen.j: 娘は、綾姫（多千姫とも。薩摩藩第8代藩主・島津重豪継室。玉貌院)、
sen.e: He had three daughters: 綾姫 (also called "多千姫"and "玉貌院") (the second wife of Shigehide SHIMAZU, the eighth lord of Satsuma domain);
He had three daughters: a daughter named Ayahime (also called Tachihime and Gyokuboin) was the second wife of Shigehide SHIMAZU, the eighth lord of Satsuma Domain),
sen.cmt: 多千姫は「たちひめ」としていますが、確認できる資料は見つかりませんでした。玉貌院は「玉貌」のみで「ぎょくぼう」と読むため、「ぎょくぼういん」としていますが、確認できる資料が見つかりませんでした。
sen.e: He had three daughters: a daughter named Ayahime (also called Tachihime and Gyokuboin) was the second wife of Shigehide SHIMAZU, the eighth lord of Satsuma Domain),

sen.j: 娘（佐賀藩主鍋島宗教養女、佐賀藩蓮池藩（蓮池鍋島家）主鍋島直寛正室）、
sen.e: the one who became the adopted daughter of Munenori NABESHIMA (the lord of Saga domain) and the lawful wife of Naohiro NABESHIMA (the lord of Hasuike domain);
sen.cmt: 「玉貌院」の読み方不明。「佐賀藩蓮池藩（蓮池鍋島家）」をweb上の「蓮池藩主」にして訳しています。
sen.e: another daughter was adopted by Munenori NABESHIMA (the lord of Saga Domain) and became the lawful wife of Naohiro NABESHIMA (the lord of Hasunoike Domain, the branch domain of Saga Domain),
sen.cmt: 蓮池藩は「はすのいけはん」です。下記サイトから、佐賀藩の支藩であることが分かるため、訳に追記しました。http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~me4k-skri/han/kyushu/hasuike.html
sen.e: another daughter was adopted by Munenori NABESHIMA (the lord of Saga Domain) and became the lawful wife of Naohiro NABESHIMA (the lord of Hasunoike Domain, the branch domain of Saga Domain),

sen.j: 娘（萩原従言正室）らがいる。
sen.e: and the one who became the lawful wife of 萩原従言.
and the last one became the lawful wife of Tsugukoto HAGIHARA.
sen.cmt: 萩原従言は「はぎはらつぐこと」です。http://www1.parkcity.ne.jp/sito/k132.html
sen.e: and the last one became the lawful wife of Tsugukoto HAGIHARA.

sen.j: 従一位権大納言まで昇った。
sen.e: He was raised to Juichii (Junior First Rank), Gon Dainagon (provisional major councilor).
He was promoted to Juichii Gon Dainagon (Junior First Rank, Provisional Chief Councilor of State).
sen.cmt: raised -> promoted官位の補足説明を用語統一リストに合わせました。
sen.e: He was promoted to Juichii Gon Dainagon (Junior First Rank, Provisional Chief Councilor of State).
